text: (vīḻcci aṭaintu) maraṇittavarkaḷāka iruntavarkaḷil evarai nām uyirppittu maṉitarkaḷukkiṭaiyil naṭamāṭuvataṟkuriya oḷiyaiyum koṭuttirukkiṉṟōmō avar, iruḷil cikki atiliruntu veḷiyēṟa muṭiyāmaliruppavaṉukkuc camamāvārā? Ivvāṟē nirākarippavarkaḷukku avarkaḷuṭaiya (tīya)ceyalkaḷ aḻakākkappaṭṭu viṭṭaṉa
